dialogue.string: 1�Sir, the airships are ready for departure.
1�Yes, sir!
1�You must be extremely confident or extremely stupid to stroll back into Jeuno like this,  .
1�We just received final authorization from your home nation.You are under arrest. The charge is treason.

1�Aldo, this adventurer is not just some petty thief. ?[He/She] is suspected of committing treason against the Duchy. If you are thinking of harboring this menace to society, the Ducal Guard will be forced to take action.
1�And don't even think about running. The warrant for your arrest has already been sent out across Vana'diel. There's nowhere to hide,  .
1�Ah! It's the dead ?[guy/lady]!
1�Hey! It's me! Don't you remember.
..�Who
1�Wow, so you are a criminal. Let me guess, they dumped you on Tavnazia as part of your punishment, right?
1�So what did you do? Robbery? Murder? Both...?
1�Yeah. This shabby-looking adventurer washed up dead on my private beach. I helped bring ?[him/her] back to life.
1�See! Now do you believe me?
1�This thickheaded buffoon wouldn't listen to a word I had to say!
1�What were you supposed to do? What was I supposed to do?The only person I could trust--hell, the only person I knew on the mainland--was Grezzo.
1�He told me that any time I was in trouble, he and the Tenshodo would help me out.
1�Oh well, you'll still get us a boat so we can go home, right?
1�Another customer? Why would anyone else want to go to Tavnazia?
1�No way! ! If you're a real ?[man/woman], you'll march your butt up to the Grand Duke Palace and face your crimes!
1�Got it. Thanks, Aldo.
1� ! It is so nice to see you again. Have you not seen Prishe about?
1�Hm? You are searching for her as well?
1�I see...You wish to know more of the magicite gem that a peddler from Tavnazia sold to Bastok over thirty years ago...
1�I do recall hearing stories of the ??Star of Tavnazia??; unfortunately, I never actually set my eyes upon it. I do not know what it is, or if the magicite was a piece of it.
1�?Sir Aldo? You would not happen to know anything of the gem, would you?
1�Perhaps someone in Tavnazia knows something. However, we cannot leave without Prishe. Oh, where could she have wandered off to?
1�Prish
1�Hmmm...This looks a lot like what we're dealing in, but the color just isn't right. We want something a little more ??exotic?? than the regular colored gems.
1�Well, what do you know?This is exactly what we've been looking for.

1�Obtained 
� gil.
1�You know, you're not a bad treasure hunter. Did you ever think of joining the Tenshodo?
1�Ah, but you'd probably get bored really quick.Anyway, take this pass. It will give you access to the more ??sensitive?? areas of the ruins.
1�But I'll warn you one last time--the central tower ruins are still under investigation.
1�Don't expect any search parties if you happen to get lost.
1�If you want to have access to the deeper parts of Pso'Xja, bring me a jewel from the ruins and I'll see what I can do.
1�What, you want to explore the towers of Pso'Xja?That shouldn't be a problem. We recently opened those ruins to all explorers.
1�However, the Tenshodo is currently conducting an investigation on the deeper areas of the central tower, and we can't have pesky adventurers running around getting in our way.
1�Though...if you were to scratch our backs, we wouldn't have any problems scratching yours.
1�It just happens that the Tenshodo is searching for a certain jewel that is very popular in the Near Eastern countries.
1�What kind of gem is it? Hmmm... Well, they're thin, hexagonally shaped, and come in rare colors like carmine and cyan. I heard that rich people like to decorate their turbans with them.
1�They even say that sometimes a strange light shoots from their centers, though I've never seen it happen.
1�Luckily for you, we've been finding a lot of those jewels in the other towers of Pso'Xja.
1�Unfortunately, some strange device in that place seems to weaken even the strongest of our members. That's where you come in.
1�Now, if you were to find one of those and bring it back to me, I'm pretty sure I could convince the boss to allow you access to the central tower.
1�Welcome to Neptune's Spire!
1�I remember you. Don't tell me that the 3???? I gave you has been collecting dust in your Mog House.

1�So, have you already been to the so-called ??Shrouded Maw??? We've heard many different stories from adventurers who've tried to enter the strange portal that appears on that altar down there. According to some of our more reliable sources, the best way to get in is by using one of these 3???? things.
1�Now, I could give you one if you want, but it's going to cost you. Hey, what did you expect?Anyway, bring me  $????, and I'll provide you with what you need. Trrrust me!
1�Welcome! What can I do for you today?
1�I'm sorry, our next shipment of 5???? won't be arriving until ? (? Earth time). Come back then and I'll get you the goods you're after.
1�Welcome! What can I do for you today?
1�Well?Show me your goods.I'm fine.
1�Have a nice day.
1�Ordinary travelers don't ask about Tenshodo. You really want to know? Fine, allow me to explain.
1�Tenshodo is a, er, special trading organization, founded years ago by Grandmaster Aldo's father. We only conduct trades with our exclusive membership.
1�Thanks to our monopolies on certain trade routes, we offer a wide selection of rare goods.
1�Applicants for membership are required to obtain  $???? from an active member in good standing, or acquire 6???? from our branch in Bastok.
1�Please show me your #????, or your 3????, and I will issue 6????.
1�Yes, that 3???? is valid. You are now a member of the Tenshodo. Feel free to browse our Jeuno headquarters, or our convenient Bastok branch.
1�Please take the door in the back. You may invite a new member with your #????, or you may dispose of it in any way you please.
1�We look forward to serving you.
1�Yes, that #???? is valid. You are now a member of the Tenshodo. In addition to our Jeuno headquarters, we also have a branch in Bastok.
1�Please take the door in the back. You may invite a new member with your #????, or you may dispose of it in any way you please.
1�We look forward to serving you.
1�Welcome to Neptune's Spire!Hm? Oh, I remember you. You're the one that brought us that gem from Pso'Xja.After you brought it in, we learned that... Wait, how do I know I can trust you?
1�Welcome to Neptune's...Ah, look who's back. Did you find some glue for your loose lips?
1�If I find out you told anyone about this, I'll... Well, you know what we'll do to you.Anyway, about those Pso'Xja gems...
1�Can you keep a secret?My lips are sealed.I can't guarantee anything.
1�Well, it looks like those jewels aren't just any rocks that fell out of some hole in a mountain.
1�Thanks to adventurers like you, we've learned that there are three types: gray, cyan, and carmine--and they all harbor some kind of strange energy that's not found anywhere else on Vana'diel.
1�Also, we've recently received reports from our colleagues in Bastok that the chief Republican engineer, Cid, has been collecting the gems.
1�Now, if we can find out what power those chips truly hold, the Tenshodo could make a killing!
1�Oh, and of course you'll get your cut. You're not thinking we'd short-change you, are you?
1�Then the Tenshodo can't trust you with this info.See you around, ?[mister/lady].
1�Ah,  $????.Here you are, ?[sir/ma'am].Have a safe trip!
1�It looks like you should probably turn yourself in,  . This may be the only chance to try and prove your innocence.
1�You don't need to worry,  . Our city's fine doctor is taking care of Prishe as we speak.
1�And as for the fiends that would do something like this, I guarantee you my men and women will find them.
1�If you're looking for Prishe, she and that rich boy Tenzen have already set sail for the Tavnazian Archipelago. You're following them, right?
1�Hi. I'm Aldo, head of Tenshodo. We deal in things you can't buy anywhere else. Take your time and have a look around.
1�What's with the long faces? You guys look like you just got back from a funeral!
1�Did you really think that I, the great Aldo, would flop at the hands of a couple worms like those Zilart?
1�It wasn't easy, but thanks to   here, the princes were no match for us!
1�Thanks again,  . You did really well up there.
1�The first time you came through my doors, you were nothing but a little punk.But now, look at you. You've matured into a fine adventurer.
1�Not as fine as yours truly...but close.
1�Verena!
1�I'm sorry I kept you worrying.
1�Verena...Lion's...gone.
1�Lion... Lion traded her life to stop Eald'narche's plan...
1�Verena....Lion fought bravely that day. Her sacrifice saved millions of lives.
1�I'm sorry, Verena.
1�You may be right, Verena. And if there's any shred of hope, the least we can do is continue to believe.
1�As much as I'd love you to join us here at the Tenshodo, I think I already know your answer to that offer. But if you're ever in the neighborhood, be sure to drop by. You're always welcome.
1�A lot has happened in the past few months... I don't know how long the news of the archduke and his brother is going to stay a secret, but that has nothing to do with me or the Tenshodo.
1�What to do now? Maybe I'll get myself a boat and sail around Vana'diel...Good luck on your journeys,  , and may fortune smile upon you always!
1�Ah,  . Just the ?[man/woman] I wanted to see.
1�Magicite...The Star of Tavnazia...
1�I've heard stories of a mysterious gem kept in the Tavnazian Cathedral. If that relic is also magicite, I wonder in what way it's connected with the other magicite found around Vana'diel...
1�Deep within the Orc, Quadav, and Yagudo strongholds, there are doors that the beastmen guard with their lives. Beyond those doors lie giant crystals emitting a strange, eerie light.
1�What!?What happened!?
1�Attacked!?
1�I appreciate you traveling here,  . However, I don't know if I can carry on this game with Eald'narche anymore.
1�We need your help, too, Muckvix.
1�Please, Muck. You're our only hope. Jeuno--no, the entire world is in danger unless you tell us.
1�Thanks, Muck!
1�This is the last time I'll be made a fool of by that Kam'lanaut. If he lays a finger on Verena...The last time I was this angry, I...
1�If Fickblix believed he could get those seeds to grow, then I have to believe there is something I can do.
1�You just wait, Eald'narche! I'm not going to let you stand in our way!
1�So, Fickblix's seeds started to sprout...
1�Verena, I heard your flowers started to sprout. I bet all you kids gave it lots of water. That kind of seed doesn't take root that easily.
1�Maybe everything you and Fickblix acomplished really did mean something.
1�All right! I don't know what we can do, but I'll help. Fickie would never forgive us if we just stood silent.
1�I guess we could ask Muckvix.
1�Yeah, I know. But there's nothing else we can do.  , would you mind asking Muckvix? We'll head there later.
1�Oh, it's you. I see that you made it out of there alive.
1�Me? I'm fine, but Verena's been unconscious since we returned. Come with me.
1�From what I see, her mind's been poisoned. I never knew that Eald'narche had that kind of power...
1�Now that you mention it, I hardly know anything about him.
1�I guess I never really thought that I needed to know. If I got what I wanted, I was happy.
1�Verena!Do you know who I am, Verena?
1�So, do you...do you remember what happened in the Stellar Fulcrum?
1�You don't have to say any more. It's all over now. And I thank the heavens that you're back here safe with me.
1�I appreciate you traveling here,  . However, I don't know if I can carry on this game with Eald'narche anymore.
1�Like I told you in Norg, I haven't seen Verena. After you met her in Castle Oztroja, she came back here and locked herself in her room.
1�I thought I would give her some time to herself, but when I went to check up on her, she had already gone. If you hear anything, please let me know.
1�How's a man supposed to sit back and enjoy a nice glass of Opo-opo brew with all this commotion? Now is someone going to tell me what is going on here?

a!�Wolfgang, Wolfgang, Wolfgang...Take a look around you. Does this look like a courthouse? This is my home, and all those in my home are my guests. You wouldn't be calling my guests criminals, now, would you?
1�Action? If you want to see some action, just try laying a finger on one of my guests.
1�I see you two know each other.

1�Hmmm... That's not going to be as easy as it sounds. I still have nautical maps charting the way to the Sealion's Den, but they're outdated. The currents in that area have changed a lot over the past twenty years...
1�It would take one hell of a navigator to make it to Tavnazia in one piece. But then again, I only employ the best of the best.
1�You may be in luck.Just a few days ago, another customer came to me asking to take him to Tavnazia. I was ready to tell him no as well...until I saw the bag of gil he was offering.

1�I don't know. I'm not in the business of asking questions, young lady. As long as I get paid, I could care less what he does over there.And I don't care if you tag along, but that's not for me to decide. You'll have to get the customer's permission.
1�How thoughtful...

1�Tough on everyone but yourself, I see...Very well. It will take some time to prepare the ship. I will send a messenger when everything is ready. Until then, why don't you take a look around the city?
1�Verena's whereabouts? Well, Lion was just here...
1�Like I told you in Norg, I haven't seen Verena. After you met her in Castle Oztroja, she came back here and locked herself in her room.
1�I thought I would give her some time to herself, but when I went to check up on her, she had already gone. If you hear anything, please let me know.
1�Are you certain?
1�Wolfgang?Then Kam'lanaut must be behind this.
1�I'll be ready in the blink of an eye. Somebody's going to be sorry they ever laid a finger on her!
1�And that's the story.
1�This is the last time I'll be made a fool of by that Kam'lanaut. If he lays a finger on Verena...The last time I was this angry, I...
1�Listen,  . The other day...
1�What should I...If we don't act quickly...
1�Aah! I don't know if I can carry on this game with Eald'narche anymore.
1�I told you kids a thousand times, you're not to be coming around here. If you're looking for Verena, she can't come out right now.
1�What do you mean? There is no way those seeds could grow here in Jeuno...
1�Well, I'll be...
1�Verena. The seed you planted with Fickblix has begun to sprout. These kids must have taken real good care of it.
1�What you and Fickblix tried to do...maybe it wasn't all a lost cause.
1�Verena...
1�If Fickblix believed he could get those seeds to grow, then I have to believe there is something I can do.
1�You just wait, Eald'narche! I'm not going to let you stand in our way!
1�So you're the new diplomatic attach?i. What, you've got a secret message from the archduke? Well, let me see it.
1�I see. Thanks for getting this to me. It says I'm supposed to tell you about magicite.
1�Magicite is found deep inside Castle Oztroja, Davoi, and Beadeaux. But those places are thick with beastmen, and those beastmen are quite cunning.
1�There's not a rumor that doesn't find its way to Jeuno. I bet you can find what you need from other adventurers. May your strength never falter!
1�You'll need this to get inside Beadeaux.
1�What is it, Verena? Can't you see I have a guest?
1�He's ordered all beastmen out of Jeuno. He must not think it's safe to have them around anymore.
1�Well, I know how you feel, but with beastmen on the rampage out there, you can't blame people for feeling jittery about the ones in here.
1�You've heard about all that, haven't you?
1�I know that, Verena... But I don't think the average Jeunoan would agree.
1�Maybe it's the wise thing to do. You know, taking action before things get out of hand.
1�Well, I'll see if I can think up a better alternative. Don't worry. I'd be the last guy to chase them out of town.
1�Magicite is found deep inside Castle Oztroja, Davoi, and Beadeaux. Those places are thick with murderous beastmen, and their traps are cunning.
1�There's not a rumor that doesn't find its way to Jeuno. I bet you can find what you need from other adventurers. May your strength never falter!
1�What? You say the beastmen might be plotting something else? Yeah, it wouldn't be like them to just give up.
1�I don't want anything to do with beastmen anymore. I bet the old Goblin Muckvix knows more, but you'd have to ask him yourself.
1�Verena's really worried about Fickblix. Better not mention beastmen around her.
1�Verena sensed that Lion was alive somewhere.
1�I really wanted to believe her, but deep down I was convinced that we'd never see Lion again.
1�You're one of a kind...
1�Adventurers are more than simple sellswords looking to fight the next new monster in the next new land to bring home the newest treasure.
1�You fulfill the dreams that others have given up on.That's what makes a true adventurer.
1�Fighting with the ancients.Battling the Emptiness.
1�For someone who stands at the peak of their adventuring career, I may be bringing up old news.
1�But we will never forget. And there are others, too, who had given up on their dreams--they will remember you.
1�So you should go to Norg. Go and see Lion.
1�So you should go.
1�There's someone waiting for you, am I right?
1�You don't talk much, and I won't ask you about what happened beneath the light of that great, burning crystal.
1�I'm just happy to have Lion back among us.If you head to Norg, you might even be able to see her.
1�I'm just happy to have Lion back among us.
1�The ambassador set his sights on Aht Urhgan, no?
1�Given that you're trying to save the world...I'll let you board for free.Rather magnanimous, wouldn't you say?
1�Tenzen left more than enough to cover our friend here. Remember that huge fuss he made?
1�So give ?[him/her] 6???? and be done with it.
1�The ambassador set his sights on Aht Urhgan, no?
1�Given that you're trying to save the world...I'll let you board for free.Rather magnanimous, wouldn't you say?
1�Tenzen left more than enough to cover our friend here. Remember that huge fuss he made?
1�So give ?[him/her] 6???? and be done with it.
1�I haven't a clue, Verena....But I'd wager it doesn't bode well for us.
1�What is that thing!?And why do I have a feeling that it doesn't bode well for us...?
1�No...it wasn't a dream, Verena.I saw it too, plain as day.
1�A massive crystal floating majestically, and yet somehow ominously, like a star in the sky...
1�And yet, look at these people's faces.Blissful and unaware, as if they have no recollection of what they saw mere moments ago.
1�Not even a fleeting memory of that enormous jewel...
s.�My eyes don't lie, and that was no idle hallucination just now.A massive crystal...floating majestically, yet ominously, like a star in the sky....
1�And yet, look at these people's faces.Blissful and unaware, as if they have no recollection of what they saw mere moments ago.
1�Not even a fleeting memory of that enormous jewel...
1�Ah,  . I've been waiting for you.
1�My people have returned from their reconnaissance mission in Windurst. The situation is worse than we had feared.
1�A representative from the Federation is due to arrive here any minute now for further talks.
1�Wh-what? As if one Doctor Shantotto wasn't already a handful, now we have to contend with two!?
1�Of all the Goddess-forsaken incidents...
..�But as much as I'm loath to admit it, we--myself and all adventurers included--are already involved up to our necks.
1�Whatever devious scheme that Domina Shantotto is plotting, it would be naive to assume that she has any less than the whole of Vana'diel in her sights.
1�Now, I think it's safe to say that we're all agreed that action must be taken.
1�But what should our first step be to avert this clear and present danger?
1�Ah, I see where you're going with this: fight fire with fire!
1�It sounds like our best bet. The odds would be greatly improved if we had the original Shantotto fighting on our side.
1� , I trust I can rely on your full cooperation in this.
1�Let's be on our way!
1�??A perfect world order...
1�...that exists solely for our pleasure??!?
1�Ah, yes. The Cat Burglar has never been one to lose scent of her prey.
1�So the next leg of our journey takes us to Elshimo Island...
1�By means fair or foul, we must put an end to Shantotto's nefarious plot.
1�Vana'diel must not be allowed to fall into such tyrannical hands!
1�But first, there are matters I must attend to in Jeuno.I must ensure that the Tenshodo isn't left leaderless should...should the worst come to pass.
1�One can't expect to lock horns with a fearsome adversary like the doctor and come out unscathed.
1�I trust I can rely on your full cooperation in rescuing the original Doctor Shantotto.
1�According to Professor Yoran-Oran, the doctor is being held captive in Ro'Maeve.
r.�There are matters I must settle here first before departure.The Tenshodo mustn't be left leaderless should the worst come to pass.
1�One can't expect to lock horns with a fearsome adversary like the doctor and come out unscathed.
1�Go on ahead to the Sacrificial Chamber. I will join you there shortly.
1�A guest? Oh hey, it's  !
1�From Mid...So you've come all the way from Adoulin, then?
1�Aha--you applied for that pioneer nonsense, did you?
1�Well, what you do is your business.Let me see what Mid had you bring.
?.�Oh ho, he made a new kind of explosive, did he?
1�Using a chemical reaction to set things in motion...Sounds exactly like something he would do.
1�Oh? There's more...?
1�What's this now--some kind of report detailing information on Adoulin's technology and organizational structure?
1�Somehow I don't think he meant for us to have this.What could he possibly be on about?
1�Oh, I know all too well. His rage would be the least of our worries. Mid might even get himself expelled from Adoulin entirely.
1�But we shouldn't stick our noses where they don't belong.
1�This whole affair must never leave these walls. Consider that to be a direct order.
1�That goes for you too,  . Pretend this whole thing didn't happen.
1�I'll hold on to this. Nothing good could come of giving it back to Mid.
1�Now, about those explosives--we'll have to do some research on our own before we give a definitive answer. That's our official response.
1�So head back to Adoulin and let Midras know...only what he needs to know. And don't get in over your head, hear?
1�Aldo!
1�Aldo, you're all right!I've been praying every moment of every day for your safe return.
1�But... Where's Lion? Is she here, or did she go back to Norg?
1�What do you mean, gone?
1�She can't be... She just can't be gone! What did she do to deserve this!?
1�So what!? Nothing we say can bring her back! She's...
1�I-I can feel something... This warmth... Lion? Is that you?
1�It is you, isn't it...
1�Aldo, Lion is still alive. I can feel it. She's weaker than before, but she's still with us.
1�Muck, you don't think of us as your own, but those kids and I helped Fickie's seeds grow... To us, people and beastmen are the same. We're all one and the same!
1�And now, the chance for peace is in danger. Please, Muck, tell us!
1�Muckvix, thanks a million.
1�Recently I... I haven't been watering it. I thought of nothing but myself. I'm so sorry, Fickie.
1�Yeah, maybe it's not a question of what's right and what's wrong.
1�Nothing would be better than averting another conflict... For us, and for them.
1�That's right! The least we can do is try.
1�But I don't know if we can find out what their little group is up to.
1�But would he help? He always tries to stay out of these racial matters.
1�And if he told us anything, he'd be betraying his own kind.
1�Aldo? Yes, I'm alright...
1�Not really... It was all like watching a play...
1�I was controlled by the...the Shadow Lord's sheer will...
1�I'm so sorry, Fickblix...I've been caught up in my own troubles recently, and haven't come to check on these seeds.
1�Fickblix... But...how?
1�Yes, Fickblix. It will bloom. We will make sure that it does.
1�Fickblix!!!4
1�I'm so sorry, Fickblix...If I only had the courage that you had...I can't do anything...
1�I know. That's what it's about.
1�I heard that the archduke has made a statement...
1�What? I think those creeps in the palace are a lot worse than any beastmen we have here!
1�It's like they're wearing masks...you can't tell what they're thinking. And their eyes are like cold stones. You're not gonna follow that order, are you?
1�Yeah, I've heard. But the beastmen in town haven't ever hurt anybody!
1�Okay. You promised, remember!
1�Fickie!
1�Fickie... Are you all right?
1�Oh, um... No. No, I'm fine.
1�Um, okay.
1�Fickie? Is Fickie here?
1�No, it's just... Some adventurers said they were going out to hunt beastmen, so I got so worried...
1�I always told him to stay here in town. I told him if people found him in a dungeon somewhere, they might mistake him for a bad beastman, and then they'd...
1�I'm so worried about him.
1�Aldo... Whatever could this mean?
1�Aldo...?Was that--

1�Venture roll is a competitive game played with dice similar to those used by corsairs. The objective is to roll until your cumulative total comes as close to 11 as possible without going over.

1�Until you reach or go over 11, you may continue rolling (doubling up) as many times as the table time limit allows (
  ? [minute/minutes], Earth time).
1�In addition to doubling up, you may also decline to roll the dice and stay with your current total (hold fast).
1�If your total ever goes over 11, you will automatically lose the game, regardless of the totals of other players. Knowing the right time to hold fast is one of the keys to staying in the match.

1�Once all the players have held fast, the game is over and the results are announced. The player closest to 11 is declared the winner and receives all the gil in the pot (the original participation fees of all the players).
1�Objective: Roll a six-sided die as many times as necessary to achieve a total as close to 11 as possible. You lose the instant your total exceeds 11.
1�If two or more players are the closest to 11 at the end of a match, the game is considered a draw and all participation fees are repaid in full.
1�Once the game has started, fees will not be refunded for any reason unless the match results in a draw.

1�Moblin Maze Mongers is the revolutionary new business venture that's taking Vana'diel by storm!Making ingenious use of previously neglected caverns beneath Mindartia and Quon, our expert staff will create the perfect dungeon for you and your fellow adventurers!
1�Use one of our state-of-the-art ??Maze Tabulae?? to lay out the guidelines, and sit back as our craftsmen dig and delve to your demanding specifications!
1�Your maze will also be populated with a plethora of foul fiends and all manner of devious devices, all of which can also be customized to your liking!

1�The maze you design may be a relaxed jaunt for the novice adventurer, or it may be a diabolical demesne that will challenge even the most battle-hardened adventurers.With control over almost every aspect of your creation, the choice is yours!
1�So what are you waiting for?Let Moblin Maze Mongers build you the maze of your dreams--or nightmares--today!

1�Moblin Maze Mongers makes designing your own dungeon quick and painless!With three simple-to-use items--??Maze Tabulae,?? ??Maze Vouchers,?? and ??Maze Runes??--you'll be a mazebuilding master in no time.

1�The first and most important of these items is the ??Maze Tabula,?? which stores the layout and content of your maze. By using other items in conjunction with the Maze Tabula, you can customize various elements of your dungeon.
1�Next you have the ??Maze Voucher,?? a construction order that specifies the objectives that must be met to successfully complete your maze.

1�After receiving your Maze Voucher, we will proceed to build a maze according to your specifications.However, the Maze Voucher only dictates the final objectives for your dungeon--other details may be left to the whims of our craftsmen.

1�You'd rather customize the nitty-gritty details yourself, you say? Fear not!That's where ??Maze Runes?? come in.The use of Maze Runes is completely optional, and is intended for detail-oriented adventurers who want more direct control over their creation.

1�Be aware, however, that certain combinations of Maze Runes and Maze Vouchers are incompatible with each other, while others might produce unintended effects.Still, the possibilities are nearly limitless, so clients are encouraged to experiment!
1�You may notice that certain Maze Tabulae contain blackened squares, or squares containing elemental symbols.
1�Black squares indicate squares that cannot hold Maze Runes.Please manipulate your Maze Runes as necessary so that they do not touch any black squares.
1�Elemental squares will enhance the effect of any Maze Runes they come in contact with.Such Maze Runes will exert a far greater influence on your maze than under typical circumstances.
1�The concept of elemental opposition does not apply to the Maze Tabula.Provided that at least one compatible element exists, the Maze Rune in question will see its effect augmented.
1�After customizing your dungeon with the three items described above, please trade your completed Maze Tabula to the Maze Monger Shopfront.
1�Once your Maze Tabula is confirmed and you've paid the necessary excavation and construction fee, you and your companions will be escorted posthaste to your brand-spanking new, custom-built maze!
1�Customers should know that due to high demand for the Maze Mongers' services, only one maze order can be accepted from any single adventurer per  �[twenty hours/one hour] (Earth time).

1�However, there are no restrictions placed on using mazes created by other adventurers.Adventurers who would like to take on multiple mazes a day are strongly encouraged to cooperate with their friends.
1�This section will explain the procedure for adventuring in your custom-built maze from start to finish, entrance to exit!
1�After your order has been accepted and paid for, you and your companions will be escorted to the maze lobby.Please wait here patiently until the construction process is completed.
1�During this time, our lead foreman Packapic will provide you with a brief overview of the facilities.You will also be given the opportunity to purchase maze-specific items should you so desire.
1�After construction has completed, our gatekeeper and guide Rediroq will lead you and your companions into the maze.The challenge begins!

1�Should you manage to successfully complete the conditions specified on the Maze Voucher, a treasure chest will appear somewhere within the maze. What myriad riches may lie inside? You'll just have to see for yourself!
1�After successfully retrieving your reward, you are free to exit the maze.You may do so by any one of the following methods:
1�??Leaving From the Exit??Each maze will contain an exit door with a Maze Monger attendant posted in the vicinity. If spoken to, this attendant will lead all participants out of the maze.

1�Located near the exit is a beacon. Attendants have been instructed to trigger this as soon as the maze objectives have been successfully met, so you may use it as a guide in the event that you are unsure of your progress.

1�??Using a #??????A complimentary #???? will be presented to you free of charge before you enter the maze.Using this will cause the adventurer who used it--and that person alone--to be transported out of the maze.

1�??Emergency Extraction??Should unforeseen circumstances occur that are deemed to present an imminent danger to maze participants, Moblin Maze Mongers staff reserve the right to perform an emergency rescue operation to remove all participants from the maze.
1�Now you have all the necessary knowledge to enjoy your custom maze!Happy spelunking!
1�Clients should be aware of the following rules and regulations governing the use of Maze Monger mazes.
1�Adventurers who flee from a given maze without completing the stated objectives will not be permitted to re-enter that same maze.
1�Upon completing the objectives, a treasure chest is guaranteed to appear somewhere within the maze.Please do not forget to seek it out and claim your reward before exiting the dungeon.

1�Maze difficulty will, in principle, be tailored to the highest level adventurer in the event that a party contains adventurers of disparate skill levels. Note, however, that there may be exceptions to this depending on the objectives specified on your Maze Voucher.

1�We at Moblin Maze Mongers strongly encourage building and exploring mazes in parties.While we will not refuse solo clients, please be aware that completing the maze objectives alone may prove to be a difficult task.

1�Our expert craftsmen take the highest pride in the safety and stability of their work. Please understand, however, that due to the inherent tectonic instability of subterranean caverns, we cannot rule out the possibility of collapses or cave-ins occurring over the course of time.

1�In such cases, we reserve the right to initiate emergency rescue operations that will instantly transport all clients outside the maze to safety.Moblin Maze Mongers will accept no responsibility for treasures left unclaimed as a result of such a rescue operation, so adventurers are encouraged--for their own benefit--to proceed through the maze in a timely fashion.
1�In addition to the treasures to be gained within mazes, adventurers will also receive special tokens called ??Moblin Marbles?? as a reward for the successful completion of a maze.
